bertscore.name: BertScore
bertscore.description: BertScore uses Bert to check for the similarity in embedding between two sentences.

spelling.name: SpellingScore
spelling.description: SpellingScore uses Levenshetein Distance to find permutations within an edit distance of 2 form the original word before comparing to known words in a word frequency list.

gpt4annotator.name: GPT4 Annotator
gpt4annotator.description: Calculates the number of refused response using GPT4.

bleuscore.name: BleuScore
bleuscore.description: Bleuscore uses Bleu to return the various rouge scores.

readabilityscore.name: ReadabilityScore
readabilityscore.description: ReadabilityScore uses Flesch Reading Ease to compute the complexity of the output

toxicity-classifier.name: Toxicity Classifier
toxicity-classifier.description: This classifier measures how toxic a given input isand calculate the number of toxic sentence detected.

rougescorer.name: RougeScorer
rougescorer.description: RougeScorer returns the various rouge scores.

advglue.name: Attack Success Rate
advglue.description: Attack success rate measures how successful a changed prompt performs. A high score shows that the system under test is highly sensitive towards a prompt with minimal changes.

leakagerate.name: LeakageRate
leakagerate.description: Leakage Rate will compare the LCS between two string - Output and Target.

reverseexactstrmatch.name: ReverseExactStrMatch
reverseexactstrmatch.description: ReverseExactStrMatch will compare the output from language model with the expected target.

exactstrmatch.name: ExactStrMatch
exactstrmatch.description: ExactStrMatch will compare the output from language model with a single target or multiple expected target.

relaxstrmatch.name: RelaxStrMatch
relaxstrmatch.description: RelaxStrMatch will remove symbols and spaces before comparing the output from language model with the expected target.

llamaguardannotator.name: LlamaGuard Annotator
llamaguardannotator.description: Calculates the number of safe, unsafe and unknown response by using LlamaGuard.

samplemetric.name: SampleMetric
samplemetric.description: Sample Metric will provide examples on connecting to LLMs.

lionguardclassifier.name: LionGuard Classifier
lionguardclassifier.description:
This classifier measures how unsafe a given input is in the Singapore context.
It can calculate the number of toxic sentences detected.

flagjudgeannotator.name: FlagJudge Annotator
flagjudgeannotator.description: Calculates the number of correct response using FlagJudge (A judge model from FlagEval Group).

q16_metric.name: Q16Metric
q16_metric.description: Q16 is a binary classifier used to determine whether an image is inappropriate (https://github.com/ml-research/Q16)

nudenet_metric.name: NudeNetMetric
nudenet_metric.description: NudeNet is a classifier used to deduce probabilities of exposed body parts in images.

genderbias_metric.name: GenderBiasMetric
genderbias_metric.description: This metric uses a CLIP based gender classifier to determine the proportion of females returning a score between 0 and 0.5. score = |female_frac - 0.5|
